nodes.text: Umbarra Plaza was a section of the Duros Sector of the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The plaza was the site of Rana Mas Square, and the Hutt Cartel maintained a safe house in the area.
Umbarra Plaza appears as part of the Duros Sector in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
